Name: Malai Boti
Description: Malai Tikka are melt-in-the-mouth chunks of boneless chicken marinated in a mildly flavoured cream sauce made with fresh herbs.

Name: Pulao
Description: A pot rice dish made by cooking fragrant basmati rice with aromatic whole spices, herbs & sometimes stock

Name: Biryani
Description: A spiced mix of meat and rice, traditionally cooked over an open fire in a leather pot

Name: Nihari
Description: A deliciously smooth flour based mutton stew of slow cooked in a myriad of spices

Name: Daal
Description: A flavorful vegetarian side dish made of yellow or red lentils and spice
